de.cect.blockid.identitymanager.exampleapp.ruleengine.logic.api

Interface BusinessRule<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The values for the subject allowed.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdultAgeBusinessRule

    public interface BusinessRule<V>
    The interface for a business rule, which should serve as a restrictive rule for some business service.
    Since:
    blockid-0.0.1
    Author:
    ctinnes
